actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for four-year terms for Representatives, for a limitation on the number of terms a person may serve in the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for four-year terms for Members of the House of Representatives. Limits to three the number of terms a Representative may serve, except that any person elected to fill a vacancy may be elected to three more terms.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for four-year terms for Representatives, for a limitation on the number of terms a person may serve in the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
